verses.text: <a href="../2-Timothy-2-1/" title="2 Timothy 2:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1  "JESUS_END"Thou therefore, my son, be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus.

<a href="../2-Timothy-2-2/" title="2 Timothy 2:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2  "JESUS_END"And the things that thou hast heard of me among many witnesses, the same commit thou to faithful men, who shall be able to teach others also.
<a href="../2-Timothy-2-3/" title="2 Timothy 2:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3  "JESUS_END"Thou therefore endure hardness, as a good soldier of Jesus Christ.
4 "JESUS_END"No man that warreth entangleth himself with the affairs of this life; that he may please him who hath chosen him to be a soldier.
5 "JESUS_END"And if a man also strive for masteries, yet is he not crowned, except he strive lawfully.
<a href="../2-Timothy-2-6/" title="2 Timothy 2:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6  "JESUS_END"The husbandman that laboureth must be first partaker of the fruits.
<a href="../2-Timothy-2-7/" title="2 Timothy 2:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7  "JESUS_END"Consider what I say; and the Lord give thee understanding in all things.

<a href="../2-Timothy-2-8/" title="2 Timothy 2:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8  "JESUS_END"Remember that Jesus Christ of the seed of David was raised from the dead according to my gospel:
9 "JESUS_END"Wherein I suffer trouble, as an evil doer, even unto bonds; but the word of God is not bound.

<a href="../2-Timothy-2-10/" title="2 Timothy 2:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10  "JESUS_END"Therefore I endure all things for the elect's sakes, that they may also obtain the salvation which is in Christ Jesus with eternal glory.
11 "JESUS_END"It is a faithful saying: For if we be dead with him, we shall also live with him:
12 "JESUS_END"If we suffer, we shall also reign with him: if we deny him, he also will deny us:
13 "JESUS_END"If we believe not, yet he abideth faithful: he cannot deny himself.
14 "JESUS_END"Of these things put them in remembrance, charging them before the Lord that they strive not about words to no profit, but to the subverting of the hearers.

<a href="../2-Timothy-2-15/" title="2 Timothy 2:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15  "JESUS_END"Study to shew thyself approved unto God, a workman that needeth not to be ashamed, rightly dividing the word of truth.
16 "JESUS_END"But shun profane and vain babblings: for they will increase unto more ungodliness.
<a href="../2-Timothy-2-17/" title="2 Timothy 2:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17  "JESUS_END"And their word will eat as doth a canker: of whom is Hymenaeus and Philetus;

<a href="../2-Timothy-2-18/" title="2 Timothy 2:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18  "JESUS_END"Who concerning the truth have erred, saying that the resurrection is past already; and overthrow the faith of some.

<a href="../2-Timothy-2-19/" title="2 Timothy 2:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19  "JESUS_END"Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure, having this seal, The Lord knoweth them that are his. And, Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity.

<a href="../2-Timothy-2-20/" title="2 Timothy 2:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20  "JESUS_END"But in a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver, but also of wood and of earth; and some to honour, and some to dishonour.
21 "JESUS_END"If a man therefore purge himself from these, he shall be a vessel unto honour, sanctified, and meet for the master's use, and prepared unto every good work.

<a href="../2-Timothy-2-22/" title="2 Timothy 2:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22  "JESUS_END"Flee also youthful lusts: but follow righteousness, faith, charity, peace, with them that call on the Lord out of a pure heart.
<a href="../2-Timothy-2-23/" title="2 Timothy 2:23 KJV verse detail"><span id="25" class="versehover">23  "JESUS_END"But foolish and unlearned questions avoid, knowing that they do gender strifes.
24 "JESUS_END"And the servant of the Lord must not strive; but be gentle unto all men, apt to teach, patient,

<a href="../2-Timothy-2-25/" title="2 Timothy 2:25 KJV verse detail"><span id="27" class="versehover">25  "JESUS_END"In meekness instructing those that oppose themselves; if God peradventure will give them repentance to the acknowledging of the truth;
26 "JESUS_END"And that they may recover themselves out of the snare of the devil, who are taken captive by him at his will.
